content: **from the website ** this dishcloth works up fast and easy it can also be used for a baby afghan by following the pattern and working your foundation chain in multiples of 3 + 2 formerly available here 1 october 1 2011 website registration expired still available at this archived link 2 1 http //www geocities com/heartland/ranch/4054/wovenstitchdc htm 2 http //replay web archive org/20090607064141/http //www lindaslists net/wovenstitchdc htm
